short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will generate a QR code for the webpage. Easy to continue browsing on other devices or share with others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will generate a QR code for the current webpage. Users can browse on one device and then easily continue browsing on their other devices. URLs are messy so a QR code simplifies loading the same webpage on other devices.
